project.name: C-C088B-OSSL-06-ST03-DT06-DF04-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088B-OSSL-06-ST03-DT06-DF04-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
